sources.title: Dangerous Waters (1936)
sources.description: Jack Holt, Robert Armstrong, Grace Bradley

metadata.Plot: Jim Marlowe (Jack Holt), captain of a cargo boat has his hands full trying to stop a gang trying to take over his ship, flood the hold and collect on insurance, but he also has to deal with his flirty wife, Joan (Grace Bradley), who has a close relationship with a crew member.
metadata.Writer: Richard Schayer, Hazel Jamieson, Malcolm Stuart Boylan
metadata.Actors: Jack Holt, Robert Armstrong, Grace Bradley
